description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Defy Gravity Extended is a unique action/puzzle platformer. The focus is 100% on great gameplay.  I guarantee you have never played a platformer like it.  9/10 - Geeks FTW; 8/10 - IGN; 4/5 - GamePro; 4/5 Evil Avatar
description.short: Defy Gravity Extended is a unique action/puzzle platformer. The focus is 100% on great gameplay.  I guarantee you have never played a platformer like it.  9/10 - Geeks FTW; 8/10 - IGN; 4/5 - GamePro; 4/5 Evil Avatar
